item.title: End TX-302 West at US-285
item.description: End TX-302 west at US-285. Turn right for US-285 north to Orla; turn left for US-285 south to Pecos.

item.title: End TX-302 West at US-285
item.description: End TX-302 west at US-285 junction.

item.title: TX-302 West - Reeves County Line
item.description: Reeves County Line on TX-302 west, crossing the Pecos River (dry when this photo was taken).

item.title: TX-302 West at FM-867
item.description: TX-302 west at FM-867 in Loving County.

item.title: TX-302 West at FM-1933
item.description: TX-302 west at FM-1933 in Mentone. Mentone is the county seat of the smallest county in the United States, by population.

item.title: TX-302 East at TX-18
item.description: TX-302 east at TX-18. Use TX-18 south for Monahans; TX-18 north for Jal, NM.

item.title: TX-18 South at TX-302
item.description: TX-18 south at TX-302. TX-302 is a truck route through Kermit.

item.title: TX-18 South at TX-302
item.description: TX-18 south at TX-302. Use TX-302 east for Odessa; TX-302 west for Mentone.

item.title: TX-18 South Approaching TX-302
item.description: TX-18 south approaching TX-302 in Kermit.
